Methods


convertTokenString:withLoggingEvent:intoString:

Allows an object to override or extend how an L4PatternLayout converts its token strings into pieces of the final formatted logging message 
- (BOOL)convertTokenString:(NSString*)token withLoggingEvent:(L4LoggingEvent*)logEvent intoString:(NSString**)convertedString;
Parameter Descriptions
token
The token string to convert
logEvent
An L4LoggingEvent that contains information about the current logging request
convertedString
A reference to an NSString that will contain the result of the token string's conversion upon exiting the method
method result: Return YES to indicate that you have converted the token string. Return NO to let the pattern layout's default behavior attempt to convert it.

(Last Updated 2004-03-14)
